author: Lauren Thomas
title: Levi Strauss CEO Chip Bergh: Coronavirus pandemic will separate retail's winners and losers
description: Levi Strauss, which has been around for 167 years, is going to use COVID-19 "as an opportunity to come out stronger on the other side," CEO Chip Bergh tells CNBC.
content:
Levi Strauss CEO Chip Bergh said the coronavirus pandemic "will further separate the winners and losers" in the retail industry today.
"The brands that are gong to win are going to be the ones that have deep connections," with consumers, Bergh told CNBC in a… [+3029 chars]
